channel.title: Javac isnt recognized. I have jdk and jre though! Please help!
channel.description: Hello, Im trying to get my java to work. i go on command prompt and type javac, and it says its not recognized. I have my path and classpath set. how come it wont work? I edited them to my newest java, jdk 6u17. Help thanks!

item.title: Javac isnt recognized. I have jdk and jre though! Please help!
item.dc:creator: @Hunter_74 Hunter_74
item.description:
@Hunter_74 wrote:

Are you sure you did it correct?

Maybe re-write it all.

NAME; CLASSPATH.

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin;
Re-write it with your correct Java.

If that doesn’t work, you could try a differn’t version of java, Like update 14 like mine?

Sorry if this doesn’t help.

Read full topic
item.source: Javac isnt recognized. I have jdk and jre though! Please help!
